name: Dice of Luck
description:
This game was made for GMTK 2022 About: this game is board game but with mini games simple note: 1- there was some issue in submission the game so transition in game is deleted. but you can play windows version if you want to see the game transition. 2- in one of mini game there is small information was wrong about mini game (in game: *press left mouse button) Credit: Jan_Hunter ---> (who make the game) Andy ---> Game tester (Thanks) asset:
